sentences.en: A high purity, high viscous organic anti - sediment agent was developed.
sentences.cn: 研制了一种高纯度 、 高粘度有机防沉剂.

sentences.en: Another algorithm was developed by the idea of viscous fluid model.
sentences.cn: 因此,采用一种基于黏滞流体模型的变形方法作为预测矫正系统.

sentences.en: As the liquid cools, it becomes viscous.
sentences.cn: 这液体冷却后会变黏稠。

sentences.en: Flow of gas or liquid due to a pressure difference is called viscous flow.
sentences.cn: 由于压力差引起的气体或液体流称为滞流.

sentences.en: Furnace operation was satisfactory, although the slag was viscous and difficult to tap from the furnace.
sentences.cn: 炉子的操作情况是令人满意的, 但炉渣很粘,出料比较困难.

sentences.en: Generally, sand magnifies vibration, while viscous powder soil damps vibration.
sentences.cn: 砂土层一般起放大作用, 粘质粉土层一般起减震作用.

sentences.en: Liquids may not be too viscous or be susceptible to crystallization.
sentences.cn: 液体不能太粘稠，也不能易结晶。

sentences.en: PZT - based piezoelectric fibers were fabricated by viscous polymer processing ( VPP ).
sentences.cn: 采用塑性聚合物方法制备了不同成分的PZT基压电纤维.

sentences.en: Some investigators maintain that large boulders must be supported by turbulence within a viscous debris flow.
sentences.cn: 有些调查者认为大漂砾是通过粘性泥石流中的涡流搬运的.

sentences.en: Suitable for viscous, strong corrosive of or easy to be crystallized media.
sentences.cn: 适于测量腐蚀性较强,且黏稠或易结晶的介质的压力.

sentences.en: The monomer, or base epoxy, is a light amber fluid which is usually quite viscous.
sentences.cn: 单体或碱性环氧树脂, 是一种淡琥珀色的液体,通常都是很粘的.

sentences.en: The mud is too viscous, you must have all the agitators run.
sentences.cn: 泥浆太稠，你们得让所有的搅拌机都开着。

sentences.en: The viscous drags is equal to the resultant force.
The viscous force constantly drains eddy energy and limits the population of eddies.
sentences.cn: 粘性力不断消耗旋涡的能量,从而抑制着旋涡的繁殖.

sentences.en: Viscous Tasting term used to indicate a heavy, dense wine.
sentences.cn: 粘性的:品尝术语,用来指深重的 、 浓厚的葡萄酒.

sentences.en: When viscous forces predominate the flow is proportional to the pressure drop across the element.
sentences.cn: 当粘滞力起主导作用时,流量当通过主要部分的压力降或正好.

phrases.tran_cn: 黏性减振器，黏性阻尼器；粘性阻尼器
粘性耗散；粘滞耗散；粘滞扩散
粘性液体，粘滞流体；黏滞液体，黏性液

trans.tran_cn: 黏的，黏性的，半流体的，黏滞的
trans.tran_en: (of a liquid 液体) thick and sticky; not flowing freely
